===Etymology===
From a line in the Song-era poem {{lang|zh|《寄吳德仁兼簡陳季常》}}, depicting {{w|zh:陳慥|Chen Zao}}'s overbearing wife, who was originally from the {{w|Hedong Commandery}}.
